params.asset_: Address of the asset of the FutureVault.
params.ibt_: Address of the ibt of the FutureVault.
params.maturity_: The maturity time of the FutureVault.
params.proxyAdmin_: Address of the admin of proxy of the FutureVault.
params.registry_: Address of the Registry contract of the FutureVault.

returns.curvePoolAddress: The address of the curve Pool deployed for ibt/pt.
returns.futureVault: The address of the futureVault deployed.

params.futureVault: The address of the futureVault against which to to get the curve pool address.

returns._0: the address of the tokens factory

params._factory: The address of the curve factory.

params._futureVaultInstance: The address of the logic contract.

params._owner: The address of the new owner

params._newRegistry: the address of the token factory
